mapper.select: select Wmt.mc_task_no , Wmt.mc_task_id , Wmw.status , Wmt.finish_status mcFinishStatusCode , Wmt.client , Wmt.mtr_ready_time , sofv.factory_name , coalesce(Crt_su.name, Wmt.crt_user) crt_user , Wmt.crt_time , coalesce(Upd_su.name, Wmt.upd_user) upd_user , Wmt.upd_time , wmt.remark , factory_confirm.crt_user_name factoryConfirmUser , factory_confirm.crt_time factoryConfirmDate , pm_audit.crt_user_name pmAuditUser , pm_audit.crt_time pmAuditDate , Bo_Su.name backOffice , Wmtv.version_id versionId , Wmtv.version_no versionNo , Wmtv.version_date versionDate , Wmt.org_id , Soov.ebs_organization_code , Wmt.bu_name , Wmt.dept_name , mc_req.source_no from wip_mc_task Wmt join wip_mc_wf Wmw on Wmw.mc_task_id = Wmt.mc_task_id and wmw.wf_id = wmt.mc_wf_id left join scm.sys_org_factory_v Sofv on Wmt.factory_id = Sofv.ebs_factory_id left join scm.sys_org_organization_v Soov on Wmt.org_id = Soov.org_id left join scm.sys_user Bo_Su ON Bo_Su.id = Wmt.back_office left join scm.sys_user Crt_su ON Crt_su.id = Wmt.crt_user left join scm.sys_user Upd_su ON Upd_su.id = Wmt.upd_user -- 最新版本信息 join ( select Wmtv.* , row_number() OVER( partition by mc_task_id order by Wmtv.crt_time desc) Rn from wip_mc_task_version Wmtv order by crt_time desc ) Wmtv on Wmtv.mc_task_id = Wmt.mc_task_id and Wmtv.Rn = 1 -- 工厂确认信息 left join ( select Wmw.* , coalesce(Su.name, Wmw.crt_user) crt_user_name , row_number() OVER( partition by mc_task_id order by Wmw.crt_time desc) Rn from wip_mc_wf Wmw left join scm.sys_user Su on su.id = Wmw.crt_user where status = 'confirm' ) factory_confirm on factory_confirm.rn = 1 and factory_confirm.mc_task_id = Wmt.mc_task_id -- 生管确认信息 left join ( select Wmw.* , Su.name crt_user_name , row_number() OVER( partition by mc_task_id order by Wmw.crt_time desc) Rn from wip_mc_wf Wmw left join scm.sys_user Su on su.id = Wmw.crt_user where status = 'verify' ) pm_audit on pm_audit.rn = 1 and pm_audit.mc_task_id = Wmt.mc_task_id -- 需求信息 left join wip_mc_req_to_task Wmrtt on Wmrtt.mc_task_id = Wmt.mc_task_id left join ( select source_id , source_no from wip_mc_req group by source_id, source_no ) mc_req on mc_req.source_id = Wmrtt.mc_req_id where Wmt.mc_task_id = #{mcTaskId}

select Wmtl.line_id mcTaskLineId , Wmtl.mc_task_id mcTaskId , Wmis.inout_stock_line_id inoutStockLineId , Wmis.line_id deliveryLineId , Wmis.line_no deliveryLineNo , Wmis.header_no deliveryNo , Wmis.header_id deliveryId , Wmis.inout_stock_id inoutStockId from wip_mc_task Wmt join wip_mc_task_line Wmtl on Wmt.mc_task_id = Wmtl.mc_task_id join wip_mc_wf Wmw on Wmw.wf_id = Wmt.mc_wf_id join ( select Wmis."type" , Wmis.header_no , Wmis.header_id , Wmis.mc_task_id , Wmis.status header_status , Wmisl.* , row_number() OVER( partition by Wmis."type", Wmisl.mc_task_line_id order by Wmisl.crt_time desc) Rn from wip_mc_inout_stock Wmis left join wip_mc_inout_stock_line Wmisl on Wmisl.inout_stock_id = Wmis.inout_stock_id ) Wmis on Wmis.mc_task_id = Wmt.mc_task_id and Wmis.mc_task_line_id = Wmtl.line_id and Wmis.type = 'IN' and Wmis.Rn = 1 where Wmtl.line_status = '110' and ( -- 行数据中含有未过账数据 或 头数据含 非终止状态数据 Wmis.header_status not in ('POSTED', 'CANCELLED') or Wmt.mc_task_id in ( select Wmis.mc_task_id from wip_mc_inout_stock Wmis join wip_mc_inout_stock_line Wmisl on Wmis.inout_stock_id = Wmisl.inout_stock_id where Wmis.status = 'POSTED' and wmisl.status = 'UN_POST' group by Wmis.mc_task_id ) )

select Wmtl.line_id mcTaskLineId , Wmtl.mc_task_id mcTaskId , Wmis.inout_stock_line_id inoutStockLineId , Wmis.line_id deliveryLineId , Wmis.line_no deliveryLineNo , Wmis.header_no deliveryNo , Wmis.header_id deliveryId , Wmis.inout_stock_id inoutStockId from wip_mc_task Wmt join wip_mc_task_line Wmtl on Wmt.mc_task_id = Wmtl.mc_task_id join wip_mc_wf Wmw on Wmw.wf_id = Wmt.mc_wf_id join ( select Wmis."type" , Wmis.header_no , Wmis.header_id , Wmis.mc_task_id , Wmis.status header_status , Wmisl.* , row_number() OVER( partition by Wmis."type", Wmisl.mc_task_line_id order by Wmisl.crt_time desc) Rn from wip_mc_inout_stock Wmis left join wip_mc_inout_stock_line Wmisl on Wmisl.inout_stock_id = Wmis.inout_stock_id ) Wmis on Wmis.mc_task_id = Wmt.mc_task_id and Wmis.mc_task_line_id = Wmtl.line_id and Wmis.type = 'OUT' and Wmis.Rn = 1 where Wmtl.line_status = '110' and ( -- 行数据中含有未过账数据 或 头数据含 非终止状态数据 Wmis.header_status not in ('POSTED', 'CANCELLED') or Wmt.mc_task_id in ( select Wmis.mc_task_id from wip_mc_inout_stock Wmis join wip_mc_inout_stock_line Wmisl on Wmis.inout_stock_id = Wmisl.inout_stock_id where Wmis.status = 'POSTED' and wmisl.status = 'UN_POST' group by Wmis.mc_task_id ) )
